definition: full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]

sentences.english: When we exam the brand, you will see Mercedes-Benz actually is a contributor to auto safety.
sentences.chinese: 作为老牌的汽车企业，奔驰在安全领域有独到的声望。

sentences.english: Also on behalf of brand "name" shoes, status, and prestige.
sentences.chinese: 一个品牌名鞋也代表声望，地位和。

sentences.english: You can certainly gain popularity; however, don't do it by paying for everyone else.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问能够获得声望，但是，不要靠收买人心得来。

sentences.english: He is a scientist of high prestige.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位有声望的科学家。

sentences.english: The Bolivarian leader's vaunted popularity tumbles.
sentences.chinese: 委内瑞拉玻利瓦尔共和国领导人所吹嘘的声望猛跌。

sentences.english: When I left he was still drivelling on about his popularity in school.
sentences.chinese: 当我离开时他还在喋喋不休地胡说他在学校的声望。

sentences.english: His letter is just a self-serving and self promotion.
sentences.chinese: 他写的这信不过是自吹自擂来提高自己的声望。

sentences.english: He once took advantage of his popularity to get back at a critic.
sentences.chinese: 他曾经利用他的声望回归到一个评论家的身份。

sentences.english: It's a daring way to jump-start one's own literary celebrity.
sentences.chinese: 发起自己在文学上的声望是一种很大胆的方式。

sentences.english: Having such a building within a settlement increases its prestige and greatly increases the education potential of characters brought up here.
sentences.chinese: 建造这样的大厦能够增加声望并加大文化教育。

sentences.english: Cantonese enjoys high reputation and spreads rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 粤方言声望日隆，迅速扩张。

sentences.english: And fulfill their duties than the spirit of personal prestige is more important.
sentences.chinese: 恪尽职守的精神比个人的声望更重要。

sentences.english: There were 9 people in attendance and three of them are of "elevated and notable repute".
sentences.chinese: 共有9人列席，其中三位是“明显升高和声望”。

sentences.english: The HKU does not need political fame.
Physical aware, of the Japanese people see is the shangguan familys reputation.
sentences.chinese: 方天翼明白，这些日本人看中的是上官家族的声望。

sentences.english: Volcker earned fame defusing inflation thirty years ago.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔克曾因在30年前化解通胀耳获得声望。

definition: Weixin county in Zhaotong 昭通[Zhao1 tong1], Yunnan
achievement/meritorious deed/contributions (for the good of society)
to have the power to rally supporters
